title: What is ROS 2?
description: Welcome to the Robot Operating System (ROS 2), the communication backbone of modern robotics. While not a traditional operating system like Windows or Linux, ROS 2 provides a powerful framework of libraries and tools to help you build complex robot applications. Think of it less as an OS and more as a robotic nervous systemâ€”a standardized way for different parts of your robot to communicate and work together.
